Field.name: Binary
Field.Description: Upload or enter the Xslt template to be used in rendering

Field.name: MimeType
Field.Description: Sets HTTP MIME type of the output stream. Default value: application/xml

Field.name: OmitXmlDeclaration
Field.Description: Sets a value indicating whether to write XML declaration Default value: true

Field.name: ResponseEncoding
Field.Description: Sets the text encoding to use Default value: UTF8

Field.name: WithChildren
Field.Description: Sets a value indicating whether to render content with all children Default value: true

Field.name: Cacheable
Field.Description:
If set the output of the application will be cached.
Switching off application cache may cause performance issues!

Field.name: CacheableForLoggedInUser
Field.DisplayName: Application is cached for logged in users
Field.Description:
If set the output of the application will be cached for logged in users.
Switching off application cache may cause performance issues!

Field.name: CacheByPath
Field.Description: Defines whether the requested content path is included in the cache key. When unchecked application output is preserved regardless of the page's current context content or request path. Check it if you want to cache application output depending on the requested context content.

Field.name: CacheByParams
Field.Description: Defines whether the url query params are also included in the cache key. When unchecked application output is preserved regardless of changing url params.

Field.name: AbsoluteExpiration
Field.Description: Given in seconds. The application will be refreshed periodically with the given time period. -1 means that the value is defined by 'AbsoluteExpirationSeconds' setting in the web.config.

Field.name: SlidingExpirationMinutes
Field.Description: Given in seconds. The application is refreshed when it has not been accessed for the given seconds. -1 means that the value is defined by 'SlidingExpirationSeconds' setting in the web.config.

Field.name: CustomCacheKey
Field.Description:
Defines a custom cache key independent of requested path and query params. Useful when the same static output is rendered at various pages.
For experts only! Leave empty if unsure.
